mapper.select: /* intrLoginInqy10101010 : 로그인 사용자 조회 */ SELECT EMP.EMP_IDX , EMP.DEPT_CD , DEPT.DEPT_NM , EMP.GRADE_CD , GRADE.GRADE_NM , EMP.EMP_NM , EMP.EMP_GENDER , EMP.EMP_PHONE , EMP.EMP_ADDR , EMP.EMP_ADDR_INFO , EMP.EMP_EMAIL , EMP.EMP_ID , EMP.EMP_PWD , EMP.EMP_HIRE_DATE , EMP.EMP_RESI_DATE FROM INTR_EMP EMP LEFT OUTER JOIN INTR_DEPT DEPT ON DEPT.DEPT_CD = EMP.DEPT_CD AND DEPT.USE_YN = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN INTR_GRADE GRADE ON GRADE.GRADE_CD = EMP.GRADE_CD AND GRADE.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE UPPER(EMP_ID) = UPPER(#{empId, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

/* intrLoginInqy10201010 : 관리자 계정 조회 */ SELECT EMP_IDX , DEPT_CD , GRADE_CD , EMP_NM , EMP_GENDER , EMP_PHONE , EMP_ADDR , EMP_ADDR_INFO , EMP_EMAIL , EMP_ID , EMP_PWD , EMP_HIRE_DATE , EMP_RESI_DATE FROM INTR_EMP WHERE UPPER(EMP_ID) = 'ADMIN'
